creator: iLoveLoL
descriptionHtml:
LoLegacy is made to a complementary app of the famous MOBA title League of Legends. The app offers a variety of latest content including champions, items, runes, builds, etc... Everything you need to increase your Elo and become successful on the Rift.

Champion Builds
Winning is an important aspect in playing any game. Let LoLegacy aid your course on the Summoner's Rift by providing a quick & easy path to your favorite champions builds which are only made possible by analyzing millions of ranked matches across all regions. Besides, probuilds help you learn how to play from your favourite professional gamers. LoLegacy also features matchups insights, counters & tips which are everything you need to know to crush your enemy.

League of Legends Universe
League of Legends is a beautiful game both in & out with amazingly developed characters. Get to know more by experiencing the magical world of Runeterra through a vast collection of biographies, stories and arts. We even feature an inspirational quote of a random champion in every app launch just for you to stay motivated and learn something unique all the time.

Summoner Profile Lookup
LoLegacy gives access to detailed match history, rank, and statistics of any summoner. Take advantage of this by analyzing your own gameplay or learning from other experienced players. You can also spy your enemies live using the real-time in-game tracker. Master all these tools and become a Master tier player yourself in no time!

(*) Profiles from Garena regions such as Vietnam, Philippines, etc... are not being supported. They will be added to the app as soon as the data from these servers are made publicly available by Riot.

Precise & Up-To-Date Information
We always keep our eyes open for every new patch release and the app will be updated shortly afterwards so you can always enjoy fresh game content. We also correct any false information as soon as possible by allowing the community to send feedback. Every effort is made to ensure that LoLegacy will always remain as your trusted source of information.

Built by Players
We love playing League of Legends as much as you do and we are passionate about this game. That is why this app is created, we are open to any feedback and will improve our product based on them. LoLegacy will always be community-driven and we are working hard to add new useful features to the app. Stay tuned!

LoLegacy isn’t endorsed by Riot Games and doesn’t reflect the views or opinions of Riot Games or anyone officially involved in producing or managing League of Legends. League of Legends and Riot Games are trademarks or registered trademarks of Riot Games, Inc. League of Legends © Riot Games, Inc.

descriptionHtml:

Champion Builds
Winning is an important aspect in playing any game. Let LoLegacy aid your course on the Summoner's Rift by providing a quick & easy path to your favorite champions builds which are only made possible by analyzing millions of ranked matches across all regions. Besides, probuilds help you learn how to play from your favourite professional gamers. League of Legends Universe
League of Legends is a beautiful game both in & out with amazingly developed characters. LoLegacy is made to a complementary app of the famous MOBA title League of Legends. The app offers a variety of latest content including champions, items, runes, builds, etc... Everything you need to increase your Elo and become successful on the Rift.

Champion Builds
Winning is an important aspect in playing any game. Let LoLegacy aid your course on the Summoner's Rift by providing a quick & easy path to your favorite champions builds which are only made possible by analyzing millions of ranked matches across all regions. Besides, probuilds help you learn how to play from your favourite professional gamers. LoLegacy also features matchups insights, counters & tips which are everything you need to know to crush your enemy.

League of Legends Universe
League of Legends is a beautiful game both in & out with amazingly developed characters. Get to know more by experiencing the magical world of Runeterra through a vast collection of biographies, stories and arts. We even feature an inspirational quote of a random champion in every app launch just for you to stay motivated and learn something unique all the time.

Summoner Profile Lookup
LoLegacy gives access to detailed match history, rank, and statistics of any summoner. Take advantage of this by analyzing your own gameplay or learning from other experienced players. You can also spy your enemies live using the real-time in-game tracker. Master all these tools and become a Master tier player yourself in no time!

(*) Profiles from Garena regions such as Vietnam, Philippines, etc... are not being supported. They will be added to the app as soon as the data from these servers are made publicly available by Riot.

Precise & Up-To-Date Information
We always keep our eyes open for every new patch release and the app will be updated shortly afterwards so you can always enjoy fresh game content. We also correct any false information as soon as possible by allowing the community to send feedback. Every effort is made to ensure that LoLegacy will always remain as your trusted source of information.

Built by Players
We love playing League of Legends as much as you do and we are passionate about this game. That is why this app is created, we are open to any feedback and will improve our product based on them. LoLegacy will always be community-driven and we are working hard to add new useful features to the app. Stay tuned!

LoLegacy isn’t endorsed by Riot Games and doesn’t reflect the views or opinions of Riot Games or anyone officially involved in producing or managing League of Legends. League of Legends and Riot Games are trademarks or registered trademarks of Riot Games, Inc. League of Legends © Riot Games, Inc.

title: LoL & Wild Rift Ultimate App

creator: iLoveLoL
descriptionHtml:
LoLegacy is made to be a complementary app of the famous MOBA title League of Legends and it's mobile version Wild Rift. The app offers a variety of latest content including champions, items, runes, builds, etc... Everything you need to increase your Elo and become successful on the Rift.

Champion Builds
Winning is an important aspect in playing any game. Let LoLegacy aid your course on the Summoner's Rift by providing a quick & easy path to your favorite champions builds which are only made possible by analyzing millions of ranked matches across all regions. Besides, probuilds help you learn how to play from your favourite professional gamers. LoLegacy also features matchups insights, counters & tips which are everything you need to know to crush your enemy.

League of Legends Universe
League of Legends is a beautiful game both in & out with amazingly developed characters. Get to know more by experiencing the magical world of Runeterra through a vast collection of biographies, stories and arts. We even feature an inspirational quote of a random champion in every app launch just for you to stay motivated and learn something unique all the time.

Summoner Profile Lookup
LoLegacy gives access to detailed match history, rank, and statistics of any summoner. Take advantage of this by analyzing your own gameplay or learning from other experienced players. You can also spy your enemies live using the real-time in-game tracker. Master all these tools and become a Master tier player yourself in no time!

(*) Profiles from Garena regions such as Vietnam, Philippines, etc... are not being supported. They will be added to the app as soon as the data from these servers are made publicly available by Riot.

Precise & Up-To-Date Information
We always keep our eyes open for every new patch release and the app will be updated shortly afterwards so you can always enjoy fresh game content. We also correct any false information as soon as possible by allowing the community to send feedback. Every effort is made to ensure that LoLegacy will always remain as your trusted source of information.

Built by Players
We love playing League of Legends as much as you do and we are passionate about this game. That is why this app is created, we are open to any feedback and will improve our product based on them. LoLegacy will always be community-driven and we are working hard to add new useful features to the app. Stay tuned!

LoLegacy isn’t endorsed by Riot Games and doesn’t reflect the views or opinions of Riot Games or anyone officially involved in producing or managing League of Legends. League of Legends and Riot Games are trademarks or registered trademarks of Riot Games, Inc. League of Legends © Riot Games, Inc.

title: LoL & Wild Rift Ultimate App

creator: iLoveLoL
descriptionHtml:
LoLegacy is made to be a complementary app of the famous MOBA title League of Legends and it's mobile version Wild Rift. The app offers a variety of latest content including champions, items, runes, builds, etc... Everything you need to increase your Elo and become successful on the Rift.

Champion Builds
Winning is an important aspect in playing any game. Let LoLegacy aid your course on the Summoner's Rift by providing a quick & easy path to your favorite champions builds which are only made possible by analyzing millions of ranked matches across all regions. Besides, probuilds help you learn how to play from your favourite professional gamers. LoLegacy also features matchups insights, counters & tips which are everything you need to know to crush your enemy.

League of Legends Universe
League of Legends is a beautiful game both in & out with amazingly developed characters. Get to know more by experiencing the magical world of Runeterra through a vast collection of biographies, stories and arts. We even feature an inspirational quote of a random champion in every app launch just for you to stay motivated and learn something unique all the time.

Summoner Profile Lookup
LoLegacy gives access to detailed match history, rank, and statistics of any summoner. Take advantage of this by analyzing your own gameplay or learning from other experienced players. You can also spy your enemies live using the real-time in-game tracker. Master all these tools and become a Master tier player yourself in no time!

(*) Profiles from Garena regions such as Vietnam, Philippines, etc... are not being supported. They will be added to the app as soon as the data from these servers are made publicly available by Riot.

We always keep our eyes open for every new patch release and the app will be updated shortly afterwards so you can always enjoy fresh game content. We also correct any false information as soon as possible by allowing the community to send feedback. Every effort is made to ensure that LoLegacy will always remain as your trusted source of information.

creator: iLoveLoL
descriptionHtml:
LoLegacy is made to be a complementary app of the famous MOBA title League of Legends and it's mobile version Wild Rift. The app offers a variety of latest content including champions, items, runes, builds, etc... Everything you need to increase your Elo and become successful on the Rift.

Champion Builds
Winning is an important aspect in playing any game. Let LoLegacy aid your course on the Summoner's Rift by providing a quick & easy path to your favorite champions builds which are only made possible by analyzing millions of ranked matches across all regions. Besides, probuilds help you learn how to play from your favourite professional gamers. LoLegacy also features matchups insights, counters & tips which are everything you need to know to crush your enemy.

League of Legends Universe
League of Legends is a beautiful game both in & out with amazingly developed characters. Get to know more by experiencing the magical world of Runeterra through a vast collection of biographies, stories and arts. We even feature an inspirational quote of a random champion in every app launch just for you to stay motivated and learn something unique all the time.

Summoner Profile Lookup
LoLegacy gives access to detailed match history, rank, and statistics of any summoner. Take advantage of this by analyzing your own gameplay or learning from other experienced players. You can also spy your enemies live using the real-time in-game tracker. Master all these tools and become a Master tier player yourself in no time!

(*) Profiles from Garena regions such as Vietnam, Philippines, etc... are not being supported. They will be added to the app as soon as the data from these servers are made publicly available by Riot.

Precise & Up-To-Date Information
We always keep our eyes open for every new patch release and the app will be updated shortly afterwards so you can always enjoy fresh game content. We also correct any false information as soon as possible by allowing the community to send feedback. Every effort is made to ensure that LoLegacy will always remain as your trusted source of information.

Built by Players
We love playing League of Legends as much as you do and we are passionate about this game. That is why this app is created, we are open to any feedback and will improve our product based on them. LoLegacy will always be community-driven and we are working hard to add new useful features to the app. Stay tuned!

LoLegacy isn’t endorsed by Riot Games and doesn’t reflect the views or opinions of Riot Games or anyone officially involved in producing or managing League of Legends. League of Legends and Riot Games are trademarks or registered trademarks of Riot Games, Inc. League of Legends © Riot Games, Inc.

title: LoL & Wild Rift Ultimate App

creator: iLoveLoL
descriptionHtml:
LoLegacy is made to be a complementary app of the famous MOBA title League of Legends and it's mobile version Wild Rift. The app offers a variety of latest content including champions, items, runes, builds, etc... Everything you need to increase your Elo and become successful on the Rift.

Champion Builds
Winning is an important aspect in playing any game. Let LoLegacy aid your course on the Summoner's Rift by providing a quick & easy path to your favorite champions builds which are only made possible by analyzing millions of ranked matches across all regions. Besides, probuilds help you learn how to play from your favourite professional gamers. LoLegacy also features matchups insights, counters & tips which are everything you need to know to crush your enemy.

League of Legends Universe
League of Legends is a beautiful game both in & out with amazingly developed characters. Get to know more by experiencing the magical world of Runeterra through a vast collection of biographies, stories and arts. We even feature an inspirational quote of a random champion in every app launch just for you to stay motivated and learn something unique all the time.

Summoner Profile Lookup
LoLegacy gives access to detailed match history, rank, and statistics of any summoner. Take advantage of this by analyzing your own gameplay or learning from other experienced players. You can also spy your enemies live using the real-time in-game tracker. Master all these tools and become a Master tier player yourself in no time!

(*) Profiles from Garena regions such as Vietnam, Philippines, etc... are not being supported. They will be added to the app as soon as the data from these servers are made publicly available by Riot.
